jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Plan and execute all digital acquisition activities (mobile app install) using ads platform including SEM, social media, display advertising campaigns and affiliate marketing
 ● Work on a budget and strive to have maximum number of new users while keeping the CAC at the optimum level
 ● Manage multiple agencies / ad networks in order to achieve acquisition objectives
 ● Work with the growth team to suggest creative growth hacking strategies and improve the acquisition funnel conversion rate
● Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)
● Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights
● Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points
● Do app install fraud monitoring and take actions to minimize the fraud numbers
 ● Plan and create small-scale experiments that to increase the new user numbers
● Suggest new digital channels that have the potential to increase new user numbers in an efficient way

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• BS/MS degree in marketing or a related field
  • Proven working experience in digital marketing (Min 2 years)
  • Highly proficient in using digital ads platform such as Facebook Ads, Google Ads, Twitter Ads
  • Have experience in managing Ad Networks for acquisition campaigns
  • Have basic understanding on organic acquisition such as App Store Optimization (ASO) and Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
  • Understand the concept of Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) and Life Time Value (LTV)
  • Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate
  • Have basic knowledge of SQL
  • Have good understanding on mobile attribution tools (e.g. Appsflyer)
  • Understand the basic of mobile app install fraud methods and its monitoring tool (e.g Appsflyer Protect 360)
  • Have basic understanding on Google Analytics
  • Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking
  • Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement
  • Able to generate meaningful reports using tools such as Supermetrics, Google Data Studio would be a plus
  • Ability to work with optimizing tools such as Smartly would be a plus
  • Experiences in handling programmatic ad buying (e.g DoubleClick) would be a plus
  • Experiences in well-known e-commerce / platform-based and mobile-based startup is a plus
